Name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle
About the game: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring soft erotic sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background. Relaxing background music. The game features 12 puzzles which you can solve in any order of your choice. The game is a bit more challenging as all puzzles are line art based and a bit more difficult. There is no time limit, but there is a timer in case you want to see how quickly you can solve each puzzle.
